room_title: Escape room "Mafia Blackout" by Escape Garden State in New York
room_address: â€‹1275 Bloomfield Avenue - Unit 49 Building 7, Fairfield, NJ 07004
room_description:
You and your group are members of the famous New Jersey mob family. News has been released that one of your associates has just ratted out the entire family operation and is working with authorities. Having just sat down for dinner with your family, you now have to find a way to leave the country.
News also indicates that the police know your location and will be there within an hour. Your only hope is a rumor you heard. Apparently, a friend named Richie is still loyal to the family and has offered to help you evade capture. If possible, you must rendezvous with him and get out of Jersey while you still can!
